short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the applicants count for Linkedin Jobs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever abandoned your job application on Linkedin discouraged by looking at the high Applicants count? If so, this App is for you. With Hide, you can easily hide the Applicants count on Linkedin and toggle to show them when needed
